name: Kleavor
description: The Axe Pokémon. A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.

abilities.name: Sharpness
abilities.description: Moves with 'Cut', 'Blade', 'Slash', 'Edge', 'Cleave', 'Razor', 'Sword', or 'Axe' in their name have their MOVE damage doubled.
